name: MinChess
description:
When you play chess, lategame is more fun when you have less amount of pieces. so I think this could be the idea of "Less is more" for the game of chess. I created a single character which acts like  "King" in the chess and goal is to reach coin.

And I'm sharing all the sources and assets in my github if you are interested. (All the code is in English so don't worry)

https://github.com/mfatihdurmus/Minchess-Game

I created this game while streaming on twitch so here is my channel if you would like to see the behind the scenes.

http://twitch.tv/mfatihdurmus
